mean_cn: n.（电影等的）预告（片）；（电影、戏剧等的）试映；  v.概述
mean_en: a description in a newspaper or a magazine that tells you about a film/movie, a television programme, etc. before it is shown to the public
sentence: Before the movie begins, previews for new movies are shown.
sentence_trans: 电影开始之前，播了新电影的预告片。
word_etyma: pre预先 + view看 → preview预观，预习
